2021

  • Srivastava named Chair of the Lane Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering
  • Dr. Srivastava to Give IEEE PES Day Webinar in Columbus, Ohio
  • Dr. Srivastava to Give a full day workshop at Resilience week
  • Dr. Srivastava to give webinar for IEEE Task Force on Cyber-Physical Interdependence for Power System Operation and Control
  • WSU researchers receive the 2021 Commercialization Gap Fund
  • Dr. Srivastava promoted to Full professor
  • Dr. Srivastava to give a keynote at the IEEE International conference on Sustainable Energy
  • Dr. Srivastava delivered keynote at the IEEE ICPEE conference 2021
  • Dr. Srivastava to give invited talk at the IEEE SEFET 2021

2020

  • Dr. Srivastava to serve in user selection panel, ERIGrid2.0
  • AI startup for electric grid resilience
  • Electric grid resilience in the pandemic
  • Dr. Srivastava to co-chair a workshop on ML and Big data Analytics in Power Transmission Systems, IEEE SmartGridComm
  • Dr. Srivastava part of the editorial board for IET GTD special issue on “Next Generation of Synchrophasor-based Power System Monitoring, Operation and Control”
  • Dr. Srivastava is part of the organizing Committee for the NSF Sponsored workshop on “Forging Connections between Machine Learning, Data Science, & Power Systems Research”
  • Dr. Srivastava is part of two panels at the IEEE PES General Meeting
  • Dr. Srivastava is guest editor for the IEEE TII special issue on, “Deep learning and data analytics to support the smart grid operation with renewable energy”
  • Dr. Srivastava to serve as the General Co-Chair of IEEE Workshop on “Modeling and simulation of Cyber-Physical Energy Systems”, Sydney, Australia
  • Dr. Srivastava to co-lead a new IEEE PES TF on Operational Tools for Enabling Resiliency
  • Dr. Srivastava received the WSU EECS Research Excellence Award
  • Dr. Srivastava to co-lead a new IEEE PES WG on Computational Challenges and Solutions for Implementing Distributed Optimization in the Power System
  • Dr. Srivastava to give a Tutorial on cyber-physical resiliency at IEEE conference, Benous Aires, Argentina
  • Dr. Srivastava gave technical talk for the AGI day
  • Dr. Srivastava to have a joint Appointment with PNNL AGI Institute
  • Dr. Srivastava to deliver IEEE Distinguish lecture at the National University of Singapore
  • Dr. Srivastava to lead a new NSF research project related to cyber-physical data analytics for edge devices in the electric grid
  • Dr. Srivastava to give keynote at Albertian Knowledge Summit
  • Dr. Srivastava to give Tutorial on the power grid resiliency at the PESGRE’ 20
  • Dr. Srivastava to address young professional at the PESGRE’ 20
  • Dr. Srivastava to be part of the TPC at ICSGSC

  • Dr. Srivastava to give keynote address at the ICPS 2019

  • Dr. Srivastava invited for the cyber security data analytics workshop at the Princeton University

  • Dr. Srivastava to give keynote lecture at NPSC, India

  • Dr. Srivastava organized panel at IEEE PESGM 2015 on ‘Microgrid as a Resource for Resiliency’
  • Dr. Srivastava organized Synchrophasror workshop at Central Power Research Institute
